title: Short & wide font ID please
content:
Can someone ID this font in the picture attached. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720125442im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mala-font_4731.jpg)
author: nic_-_mic

comments.content:
From these few letters, it could be just about any sans serif. Whatever it is, it appears to have been expanded horizontally, to judge from the difference between the thickness of horizontal and vertical strokes.  
For comparison, here's Franklin Gothic Heavy with the width approximately doubled.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720125442im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Mali_6102.jpg)
